overview: In a staggering example of lacking imagination, Petula Clark's third US TV Special was given the exact same name as her first.  Unbelievably, a third special also had that exact same title a few years later!  Guests: Peggy Lee, Dean Martin, the Everly Brothers, David Frost. Songs: Beautiful Sounds, duet w/ Peggy Lee (I'm A Woman/Wedding Bell Blues), Games People Play (w/ The Everly Brothers), duet medley w/ Dean Martin on a horse (Hey Good Lookin'/Detour/Things/I Walk The Line/Just A Little Lovin'), medley (Come Together/Great Come And Get It Day), When Johnny Comes Marching Home (w/ Lee), Fool On The Hill.
tagline: Petula Clark's third US TV Special with Dean Martin and Peggy Lee.
title: Petula
